_meanings:
A kind of
{#hetvABAsa#} or fallacy in NyƒÅya, a 
subdivision of the {#anEkAMtikahetvABAsa#};
{#vastumAtrapakzako'nupasaMhArI#} that is, that
which includes every known thing
in the {#pakza#} and thus prevents the
corroboration of a general rule of
causation by illustrations, positive
or negative; as {#sarvaM nityaM prameyatvAt#};
{#atra sarvasyEva pakzatvAt prameyatvaM heturanupasaMhArI#}
{#anvaye vyatireke vA dfzwAMtABAvAt#}.
